headline: American Express (AXP): 61% YTD Growth – What’s Fueling Its Continued Success?
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 10 Top Performing Dividend Stocks in 2024. In this article, we are going to take a look at where American Express Company (NYSE:AXP) stands against the other top performing dividend stocks in 2024. headline: These 3 Stocks Have Made Warren Buffett the Most Money in 2024. Are They No-Brainer Buys for the New Year?
summary: Warren Buffett once wrote, "The weeds wither away in significance as the flowers bloom."  Using Buffett's analogy, his Berkshire Hathaway garden had lots of blooming flowers in 2024.  Buffett's timing was almost perfect in buying Jefferies.

headline: Nearly a quarter of people ‘have already booked overseas holidays for 2025’
summary: Those planning a holiday abroad expect to spend £1,753 on average while those going on a UK-based trip plan to spend £784.
